channel.title: My 508 SAR isn't working(z508)
channel.description:
Original code: [code] ::Copyright © MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off @echo auto server program... title Server Automated Restarter
:start set time=3500 start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC[/code]
My code: [code] @echo off @echo auto server program... title Server Automated Restarter
:start set time=3500 start run.cmd :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start[/code]
it dose this: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11b4xi0.jpg[/img]
and when the timer reaches zero: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/10eio7s.jpg[/img]
then the timer restarts and repeats.... help please

item.title: My 508 SAR isn't working(z508)
item.dc:creator: @samtherule samtherule
item.description:
@samtherule wrote:

Original code:

[code] ::Copyright © MMVIII all rights reserved 2008
@echo off
@echo auto server program…
title Server Automated Restarter

       :start
              set time=3500
              start run.bat           
       :loop
              cls
              IF %time% GTR 0 (
               set /a time=%time% - 1
                set /a min=%time%/60
                 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds.
                echo   %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes.
               ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL
              goto loop
              ) 
       taskkill /f /im java.exe
      cls
     goto start
 ::Made By RSC[/code]

My code:

[code] @echo off
@echo auto server program…
title Server Automated Restarter

       :start
              set time=3500
              start run.cmd           
       :loop
              cls
              IF %time% GTR 0 (
               set /a time=%time% - 1
                set /a min=%time%/60
                 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds.
                echo   %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes.
               ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL
              goto loop
              ) 
       taskkill /f /im java.exe
      cls
     goto start[/code]

it dose this:

and when the timer reaches zero:

then the timer restarts and repeats… help please

Read full topic
